title: Blog Revival 2026
description: A comprehensive journey of reviving a 3-year-old Next.js blog: discovering AI-assisted development, upgrading from React 17 to 19, migrating build tools, and implementing a retro-brutalist design system.
summary: How I transformed a dormant Next.js blog from a minimal academic aesthetic to a retro-brutalist terminal design, while upgrading everything from React 17 to 19 and Tailwind 3 to 4.
